channel.title: My ipmute works but my unipmute does not 317 Command

item.title: My ipmute works but my unipmute does not 317 Command
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Okay so i ipmuted someone and i try using the unipmute command But Does Not Work
Same goes for ::mute and ::unmute i canâ€™t un mute people here are my codes:

::UnMute

} if (command.startsWith("unmute") && playerRights >= 1) { try { StringTokenizer st = new StringTokenizer(command, "-"); if(st.countTokens() == 2) { st.nextToken(); String otherPName = st.nextToken(); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); deleteFromFile("../Data/Mutes.txt", otherPName); if (otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.muted = false; p.sM("You have been un-muted by " + playerName); } sM(otherPName + " has been unmuted.");

::unipmute

} if (command.startsWith("unipmute") && playerRights >= 1) { try { StringTokenizer st = new StringTokenizer(command, "-"); if(st.countTokens() == 2) { st.nextToken(); String otherPName = st.nextToken(); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if (otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; deleteFromFile("../Data/Mutes2.txt", p.connectedFrom); p.muted = false; p.sM("You have been un-ip muted by " + playerName); } sM(otherPName + " has been un-ip muted."); } } catch (Exception e) { sM("Try entering a name you want to unmute.."); } }

Read full topic
